title: Stellantis - Wikipedia
snippet: Stellantis is headquartered in Hoofddorp, Netherlands, while the CEO now operates from Auburn Hills, Michigan. As of 2025, Stellantis ranked as the world's fifth-largest automaker by global sales volume, behind Toyota, Volkswagen Group, Hyundai Motor Group, and the Renault–Nissan–Mitsubishi ...

title: Stellantis news - Today’s latest updates - CBS Detroit
snippet: Stellantis said the Warren Truck Assembly Plant will be idled for three weeks and is expected to resume production the week of Nov.

title: Stellantis Media - Homepage
snippet: December 15, 2025 - Stellantis reached a major hiring milestone at its Windsor Assembly Plant. With more than 1,000 employees now on board, this achievement marks a significant step toward the creation of 1,500 jobs for the third shift launching at the plant in early 2026.
